title: Ed Butka
summary: Edward Luke Butka (January 7, 1916 – April 21, 2005), nicknamed "Babe", was a  Major League Baseball first baseman who played for the Washington Senators in 1943 and 1944.
content:
Edward Luke Butka (January 7, 1916 – April 21, 2005), nicknamed "Babe", was a  Major League Baseball first baseman who played for the Washington Senators in 1943 and 1944.
